lexUnit.name: salesman.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a person whose job involves selling or promoting commercial products

sentence.text: A salesman at one licensed dealer used to read his clients ' horoscopes for them .
I was found wandering by Mr Ozzy Dunk , a salesman for Golden Touch Sunbed Centres .
My father was a salesman for an engineering firm selling pit motors .

John is a car salesman .

He could have been a computer salesman .
Insurance salesmen shall be banned .
Jennifer and insurance salesman Dennis Crawford split up when the model was a teenager .
Physical attraction was drawing an insurance salesman into a web of murder .
Research shows that in 1990 about 60% of us received calls from telephone salesmen , yet three quarters of us object to them .
